channel.title: Adding Friends/Ignores Lists
channel.description:
Hey,
After downloading Killamess' "Final Devolution" source, I realised -OMG THIS HAS THE PERFECT MELEE/RANGED/MAGE COMBAT- So anyway now I want to use this as my base, etc, etc..
BUT.
The friends and ignores lists haven't been added yet, and therefore all that comes up in the friends list tab and the ignores list tab is 'Loading' which obviously isn't wanted... so what I would like help with is... ehemm.
HOW do I add a friends list and ignores list into my awesome new source?
Thanks.

item.title: Adding Friends/Ignores Lists
item.dc:creator: @Sinior_Jube_Head Sinior Jube Head
item.description:
@Sinior_Jube_Head wrote:

Hey,

After downloading Killamess’ “Final Devolution” source, I realised -OMG THIS HAS THE PERFECT MELEE/RANGED/MAGE COMBAT-
So anyway now I want to use this as my base, etc, etc…

BUT.

The friends and ignores lists haven’t been added yet, and therefore all that comes up in the friends list tab and the ignores list tab is ‘Loading’ which obviously isn’t wanted… so what I would like help with is… ehemm.

HOW do I add a friends list and ignores list into my awesome new source?

Thanks.
